column5: I want to head up to the Nippissing or Muskoka region for a few days in August although I need some recommendations. This is my first time fishing eyes in Canada. I'm pretty familiar with the area, I sled up there a few times a year. Any recommendations are appreciated. Thanks folks.
Visit website written by Bill Rivers, www.anglingadventures.com. He will also answer emails if you have any questions.
Contact Rick Tinney at Deerpath lodge. Nice people and very helpful.Jimbo
